titleStmt.title: Robbery rewarded, or, An account of five notorious high-way-men's exploits: viz. James Slauter, John White, John VVilliams, alias, Matchet, Francis Jackson, VValter Parkhurst. The manner their taking on the 17th of March last past, one of their company, viz. James Slauter being ... tune is, Packington's pound.

Robbery rewarded, or, An account of five notorious high-way-men's exploits: viz. James Slauter, John White, John VVilliams, alias, Matchet, Francis Jackson, VValter Parkhurst. The manner their taking on the 17th of March last past, one of their company, viz. James Slauter being ... tune is, Packington's pound.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby in VVest-smith-field,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Verses in black letter, chorus in Roman.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
